channel.title: Brancha Blog
channel.description: Insights and advice for service business owners on building a strong online presence and growing their business.

item.title: Building Customer Trust Through Your Online Presence
item.description: Trust begins before the first interaction. Your online presence either builds confidence or creates doubt.

item.title: Managing Your Business Online Reputation
item.description: Your online reputation forms whether you manage it or not. Taking control prevents problems and builds trust.
